Pointless API Docs

pointless/prelude/numerical.ptls (source)

sum(list) link 
Get the sum of a list of numbers
range(a, b) link 
Get a list of numbers:
  [a, a + 1, a + 2, ... b] if a < b
  [a, a - 1, a - 2, ... b] if a > b
  [a]                      if a == b
toFloat(val) link 
Convert a number or a string to a float
toInt(val) link 
Convert a number or a string to an integer (truncates floats)
floor(n) link 
Round number down
ceil(n) link 
Round number up
round(n) link 
Round a number to the nearest int value
asin(n) link
acos(n) link
atan(n) link
atan2(y, x) link 
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Atan2#Definition_and_computation
sin(n) link
cos(n) link
tan(n) link
ln(n) link
logBase(b, a) link
pi link 
pi, to as many digits as I could remember
euler link 
e, to as many digits as I could remember
abs(n) link 
Get the absolute-value of a number
pow(b, a) link 
pow(b, a) = a ** b
mul(b, a) link 
mul(b, a) = a * b
div(b, a) link 
div(b, a) = a / b
mod(b, a) link 
mod(b, a) = a % b
add(b, a) link 
add(b, a) = b + a
sub(b, a) link 
sub(b, a) = b - a
max(a, b) link 
Get the larger of two numbers
min(a, b) link 
Get the smaller of two numbers
minimum(values) link 
Get the smallest number in a non-empty collection
maximum(values) link 
Get the largest number in a non-empty collection
argmin(func, values) link
argmax(func, values) link
